name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Edward BLANDA, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
Former Justice Hutchinson did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Edward BLANDA, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Former Justice Hutchinson did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Anthony W. DeBernardo, Jr., Richard H. Galloway & Associates, P.C., Greensburg, for appellant.
John J. Driscoll, Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
533 A.2d 708
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Edward BLANDA, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 21, 1987.
Decided Dec. 3, 1987.
Anthony W. DeBernardo, Jr., Richard H. Galloway & Associates, P.C., Greensburg, for appellant.
John J. Driscoll, Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
